      • calendarSyncEnabledByDefault

        public Configuration.Builder calendarSyncEnabledByDefault(boolean enabled)
        Set whether or not calendar synchronization should be enabled by default.

        Note that any value set by Configuration.setCalendarSyncEnabled(boolean) will take precedence over this value for the lifetime of the install when Configuration.isCalendarSyncEnabled() is called.

        Parameters:
        enabled - true if it should be enabled by default, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        Current instance.

      • tripRecordingEnabledByDefault

        public Configuration.Builder tripRecordingEnabledByDefault(boolean enabled)
        Set whether or not trip recording should be enabled by default.

        Note that any value set by Configuration.setTripRecordingEnabled(boolean) will take precedence over this value for the lifetime of the install when Configuration.isTripRecordingEnabled() is called.

        Parameters:
        enabled - true if it should be enabled by default, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        Current instance.

      • monitorUserLocation

        public Configuration.Builder monitorUserLocation(boolean enabled)
        Set whether or not the user's location should be monitored. This feature is used to send timely pre-drive alerts to users for upcoming trips.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if it should be enabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        Current instance.

      • build

        public Configuration build()
        Creates a new configuration.
        Returns:
        Configuration instance.
